name: WWE Universe
summary:
Are you ready for the most AUTHENTIC WWE game on your phone? Assemble a roster of your favorite RAW, SmackDown Live, NXT, Legend, and Hall of Fame Superstars. THIS is your chance to take on the fiercest WWE competition. 
 
Your Roster. Your Superstars. It’s YOUR Universe!

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: WWE Universe - Available NOW on App Store & Google Play!
